favourite.article: May God forgive the laxity of today's Christians. We have not toiled, nor have we worked. God have mercy!
May God find us faithful in His work IJN. Keep on working, our Labour is not in vain in the Lord. In due time we shall be rewarded in Jesus Name Amen. Thanks for uploading this song. God bless you.
Joining Him where He is at workâ€”what a privilege!
May God find us faithful in His work IJN. Keep on working, our Labour is not in vain in the Lord. Thanks for uploading this song. God bless you.
This hymn always bring great inspiration to me for serving in the ministry of Jesus Christ
I love this hymn... Good inspiration.
